column2: Times change.  The mortals have entered the Renaissance.
Times change.  The mortals have entered the colonial era.
Times change.  The mortals have entered the Industrial age.
Times change.  The mortals have entered the Modern nights.
Convert to local culture for Masquerade.
Time moves on and customs change.  You should convert from your culture to that of your prey so as not to draw attention to yourself.  This will help preserve the Masquerade.
